name: Set UI Layout
description: Control the overall UI layout and slot configuration. Supports 10 layout modes including original modes (standard, split, sidebar-focus, fullscreen) and industry-standard foolproof layouts (dashboard, master-detail, app-shell, three-column, board, feed). Use this to orchestrate the spatial arrangement of content - layout changes happen smoothly in real-time. Choose semantic layout names that match your use case for bulletproof UIs.

mode.description: Original modes: 'standard' (chat + sidebar), 'split' (chat + panes), 'sidebar-focus' (sidebar emphasized), 'fullscreen' (content only). Industry-standard: 'dashboard' (responsive widget grid), 'master-detail' (list + detail 1/3-2/3), 'app-shell' (header/nav/content), 'three-column' (IDE-style nav|content|inspector), 'board' (Kanban columns), 'feed' (centered timeline max-width 768px).

splitRatio.description: For 'split' mode: ratio of left pane width to total width (0.0-1.0). Default 0.66 (2/3 left, 1/3 right). Example: 0.5 = equal split, 0.7 = larger left pane.

slots.description: Configure which slots are visible and their behavior. Keys: 'sidebar', 'top', 'primary', 'secondary'. Values: objects with 'visible' (boolean) and optional 'collapsed' (boolean for sidebar).

collapsed.description: Start sidebar in collapsed state (icon only)

visible.description: Show/hide primary pane (left in split mode)
Show/hide secondary pane (right in split mode)

topBanner.description: Configure the top banner content (only if slots.top.visible = true)

dismissable.description: Allow user to close banner (default: true)

prompt.description: Prompt to send to chat when clicked

animate.description: Enable smooth animated transitions for layout changes (default: true)
